import React from 'react'; import axios from "axios"; import Products from '../components/Products'; class ProductsList extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { products: [{ "pk": 1, "name": "111", "price": 123.0, "brand": "/media/cloth_shop/media/images/logo_photos/lacostelogo_S5zWvAv.png", "main_photo": "/media/cloth_shop/media/images/main_photos/ruins1_ef2nT3B.png" }, { "pk": 1, "name": "111", "price": 123.0, "brand": "/media/cloth_shop/media/images/logo_photos/lacostelogo_S5zWvAv.png", "main_photo": "/media/cloth_shop/media/images/main_photos/ruins1_ef2nT3B.png" }, { "pk": 1, "name": "111", "price": 123.0, "brand": "/media/cloth_shop/media/images/logo_photos/lacostelogo_S5zWvAv.png", "main_photo": "/media/cloth_shop/media/images/main_photos/ruins1_ef2nT3B.png" }], brands: [] } } fetchProducts = () => { axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/products").then(res => { this.setState({ products: res.results }); }); } fetchBrands = () => { axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/").then(res => { this.setState({ brands: res.data }); }); } componentDidMount() { this.fetchProducts(); this.fetchBrands(); } componentWillReceiveProps(newProps) { if (newProps.token) { this.fetchProducts(); } } render() { return (
